channel.title: Project Gold - 24/7 VPS - NEED STAFF - Great Features - Lag-Free - ALL SKILLS
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/FZuDWF.jpg[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/igzdxf.jpg[/img] [img]http://images.cooltext.com/2695661.png[/img] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=projectgold.no-ip.org]CLICK HERE TO VOTE FOR THE SERVER[/url] [img]http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/images/playnow.png[/img] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?c8l8r798bx9z0il]Download Client[/url] [img]http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/images/playnow.png[/img][url=http://goldwebclient.hostzi.com/]Play Webclient[/url] [img]http://www.epicurus-rsps.net/images/forums.jpg[/img] [url=http://www.projectgold.coolbb.net]Forums[/url] [img]http://battle-x.net/public/style_images/infinite_dark/forum.png[/img][url=http://www.projectgold.coolbb.net/register.php]Register[/url]
[u][b]Features:[/b][/u] [i]-Perfect combat -All 24 skills are fully trainable, even farming, construction, etc -Prestige system (Just like COD, you prestige, earn points and exchange them for rares etc) -Skilling arena to help you level up -Ancient and lunar magic -Ancient curses, so you can use that amazing turmoil -100% working range and magic -Great leveling up -Double XP events -Real pking and drops, just like Runescape! -Zombies (NEW) (JUST LIKE COD - CUSTOM MINI-GAME) -Pyramid Plunder -Domination Tower (CUSTOM MINI-GAME) -Barrows -Pest Control -Duel Arena -Castle Wars -Tzhaar Fight Caves -Tzhaar Fight Pits -Barbarian Assault -Warrior's Guild -Frost Dragons -Complete GWD, with all 4 gods -Giant Mole, with real burrowing -Strykywerms -Tormented Demons -Kalphite Queen -KBD -Daggonoth Kings -Chaos Elemental -Everlasting -Nomad -Corporal Beast -Dungeoneering -Monsters -Complete Brimhaven Dungeon -Complete Taverly Dungeon -Complete Slayer Tower -Complete Varrock Sewers -100+ Other Spawned NPC's to be trained on. -ALL Chaotic Weapons -Extreme Potions -Royal -Torva -Pernix -Virtus -Dicing and Gambling -Few Customs -Dragon Claws -Korasi Sword with working SPEC. -Ceremonial -Colored Whips -Many, many new Runescape items.[/i]
[b][u]Pictures[/u][/b] Full Virtus WORKING [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/0thDoi.jpg[/img] Full Torva WORKING [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/mFa5eQ.jpg[/img] Full Pernix WORKING [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/B1Wg0f.jpg[/img] Dragon Pickaxe [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/IMSUa3.jpg[/img] Inferno Adze! [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/oCimZG.jpg[/img] Some of the stuff from the Prestige Point Shop [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/8uBSkp.jpg[/img] The IMPOSSIBLE Avatar of Destruction [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/hUHCYn.jpg[/img] PK Gear from the PKP shop [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/igrM5S.jpg[/img] Working Pest Control with great rewards! [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/zmjfpR.jpg[/img] Working Barrows Mini-Game [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/RToNex.jpg[/img] Semi-Working God Wars with Fully-Working drops! [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/6RHtSW.jpg[/img] Waiting for PC to start [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/no0efe.jpg[/img] Fully working fight caves with waves and Fire Cape reward! [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/xOLqaJ.jpg[/img] Fully working Duel Arena [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/SAdQEF.jpg[/img] Korasi spec with working animation [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/iLLN13.jpg[/img] Working Barbarian Assault Mini-game [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/bksGvG.jpg[/img] Working Warriors Guild Mini-Game [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/tfoznM.jpg[/img] Dungeoneering! [img]http://i.imgur.com/sQItT.png[/img] Notification upon maxing a skill just like the real Runescape [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/0KaBnP.jpg[/img] Working QC [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/jNF4UR.jpg[/img] Working Prestige System [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/QsQ1l2.jpg[/img] All 24 Skills Working [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/TEmZhk.jpg[/img] Dominion Minigame rewards [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/4lztA2.jpg[/img] Pest Control rewards [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/LcnjnB.jpg[/img] Getting the curses prayer [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/0z9gMf.jpg[/img] Required items [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/XTl2mv.jpg[/img] Working Clan System [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/WaDlRM.jpg[/img] [/center]

item.title: Project Gold - 24/7 VPS - NEED STAFF - Great Features - Lag-Free - ALL SKILLS
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

[center]


CLICK HERE TO VOTE FOR THE SERVER

Download Client
Play Webclient
Forums
Register

[u][b]Features:[/b][/u]

-Perfect combat
-All 24 skills are fully trainable, even farming, construction, etc
-Prestige system (Just like COD, you prestige, earn points and exchange them for rares etc)
-Skilling arena to help you level up
-Ancient and lunar magic
-Ancient curses, so you can use that amazing turmoil
-100% working range and magic
-Great leveling up
-Double XP events
-Real pking and drops, just like Runescape!
-Zombies (NEW) (JUST LIKE COD - CUSTOM MINI-GAME)
-Pyramid Plunder
-Domination Tower (CUSTOM MINI-GAME)
-Barrows
-Pest Control
-Duel Arena
-Castle Wars
-Tzhaar Fight Caves
-Tzhaar Fight Pits
-Barbarian Assault
-Warrior’s Guild
-Frost Dragons
-Complete GWD, with all 4 gods
-Giant Mole, with real burrowing
-Strykywerms
-Tormented Demons
-Kalphite Queen
-KBD
-Daggonoth Kings
-Chaos Elemental
-Everlasting
-Nomad
-Corporal Beast
-Dungeoneering -Monsters
-Complete Brimhaven Dungeon
-Complete Taverly Dungeon
-Complete Slayer Tower
-Complete Varrock Sewers
-100+ Other Spawned NPC’s to be trained on.
-ALL Chaotic Weapons
-Extreme Potions
-Royal
-Torva
-Pernix
-Virtus
-Dicing and Gambling
-Few Customs
-Dragon Claws
-Korasi Sword with working SPEC.
-Ceremonial
-Colored Whips
-Many, many new Runescape items.
